name: Invincible Medusa
description:
In vain they disturbed Medusa in her possessions. She won't let anyone out. Everyone will pay for the violation of her borders.

"Invincible Medusa" is a 2D arcade slasher, playing Medusa you need to clear all the levels from enemies. Be careful - enemies are very dangerous, and you have nothing but a trident. Develop a smart strategy, collect apples from the dead to replenishing health. Your dexterity and reaction will decide the outcome of the battle!

Game Features:
  • Nice pixel-art style
  • 30 levels to beat
  • Challenging gameplay
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Cool OST
